Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks for a temporary attack boost.

Name: Affinity Sliding
Description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

Name: Agitator
Description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

Name: Ammo Up
Description: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

LevelDetails.1: Expands clip size for some ammo types.
LevelDetails.2: Expands clip size for many ammo types.
LevelDetails.3: Expands clip size for most ammo types.

Name: Artillery
Description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

LevelDetails.1: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
LevelDetails.2: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
LevelDetails.3: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

Name: Attack Boost
Description: Increases attack power.

Name: Ballistics
Description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

Name: Berserk
Description: Switch to the Blue Swap Scroll and all vitality will change to red gauge and start decreasing. As long as you have red you cannot faint.

LevelDetails.2: Slows the speed at which your red gauge depletes when using the Blue Swap Scroll.

Name: Bladescale Hone
Description: Dodge rolling to evade an attack with your weapon drawn will recover sharpness, refill bowgun ammo, or give Close-range Coatings a temporary boost.

Name: Blast Attack
Description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

Name: Blast Resistance
Description: Grants protection against blastblight.

LevelDetails.1: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
LevelDetails.2: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Name: Blight Resistance
Description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

Name: Blood Rite
Description: A proportion of damage dealt is converted to health when striking a broken monster part.

LevelDetails.2: Increases the amount of health you recover.
LevelDetails.3: Further Increases the amount of health you recover.

Name: Bloodlust
Description: The effects of the Frenzy virus change. Health is gradually reduced, but you gain a variety of effects. Frenzy virus occurs regularly when in combat.

LevelDetails.1: While infected, attack & evasion increase & stamina use reduced. On recovery, red vitality gauge is restored, and affinity increases.
LevelDetails.2: While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increase to affinity.
LevelDetails.3: While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increases duration of increased affinity.

Name: Bludgeoner
Description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.

LevelDetails.1: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
LevelDetails.2: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
LevelDetails.3: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

Name: Bombardier
Description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

Name: Botanist
Description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

LevelDetails.1: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
LevelDetails.2: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
LevelDetails.3: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
LevelDetails.4: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

Name: Bow Charge Plus
Description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

Name: Bubbly Dance
Description: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted.
LevelDetails.3: Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement.

Name: Buildup Boost
Description: Increases attack power when you land attacks that build poison, paralysis, sleep, blast, or exhaust. (Exhaust - ammo/phials/coatings only)

LevelDetails.1: While active, increases attack power by 10%.
LevelDetails.2: While active, increases attack power by 15%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, increases attack power by 20%.

Name: Burst
Description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (The amount of increase depends on the weapon.)

LevelDetails.1: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an extra stat boost.
LevelDetails.2: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost.
LevelDetails.3: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.

Name: Capture Master
Description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Name: Carving Master
Description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Name: Carving Pro
Description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

Name: Chameleos Blessing
Description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos.

LevelDetails.1: Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds.
LevelDetails.2: Also negates minor and major wind pressure.
LevelDetails.3: Also extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

Name: Charge Master
Description: When a charged attack hits a monster, the element and status buildup of the charged attack increases.

LevelDetails.1: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
LevelDetails.2: When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
LevelDetails.3: When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup.

Name: Coalescence
Description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

LevelDetails.1: While active, attack +12, element attack power +2, and status buildup +5%.
LevelDetails.2: While active, attack +15, element attack power +3, and status buildup +10%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, attack +18, element attack power +4, and status buildup +15%.

Name: Constitution
Description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

Name: Counterstrike
Description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

Name: Critical Boost
Description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

LevelDetails.1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%.
LevelDetails.2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%.
LevelDetails.3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

Name: Critical Draw
Description: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

Name: Critical Element
Description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

Name: Critical Eye
Description: Increases affinity.

Name: Defense Boost
Description: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.

Name: Defiance
Description: Increases defense when large monsters become enraged.

LevelDetails.1: While active, nullifies weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors.
LevelDetails.2: While active, nullifies weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors. Reduces all strong ones, def +5.
LevelDetails.3: While active, nullifies weak and strong roars, wind pressure, and tremors, def +10.
LevelDetails.4: While active, nullifies weak and strong roars, wind, and tremors, reduces powerful roars & d. wind, def +20.
LevelDetails.5: While active, nullifies weak, strong, and powerful roars, wind & dragon wind, and tremors, def +30.

Name: Dereliction
Description: Qurio will drain health, but also bolster your attacks. Multiple Qurio further bolster attacks and let you recover health when performing a Switch Skill Swap.

LevelDetails.1: Using Red Scroll: Increased elemental and status values Using Blue Scroll: Increased attack and stun potency
LevelDetails.2: Bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used.
LevelDetails.3: Further bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used.

Name: Diversion
Description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

Name: Divine Blessing
Description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

LevelDetails.1: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
LevelDetails.2: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Name: Dragon Attack
Description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Name: Dragon Conversion
Description: When using the Red Swap Scroll, all elemental resistance is set to 0 and converted into elemental attack. The Blue Swap Scroll raises elemental resistance.

LevelDetails.2: All elemental resistances +5. When using the Blue Swap Scroll, resistance buildup increases when continuously attacking.
LevelDetails.3: All elemental resistances +10. When using the Red Swap Scroll, the conversion rate for elemental attacks increases.

Name: Dragon Resistance
Description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Name: Dragonheart
Description: Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health. Weapons lose all non-dragon effects.

LevelDetails.1: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30.
LevelDetails.2: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
LevelDetails.3: When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
LevelDetails.4: Contract dragonblight when at 70% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +5% attack power.
LevelDetails.5: Contract dragonblight when at 80% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +10% attack power.

Name: Earplugs
Description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
LevelDetails.3: Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
LevelDetails.4: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.
LevelDetails.5: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

Name: Element Exploit
Description: Increases elemental damage when attacking body parts upon which the element are highly effective.

LevelDetails.1: Attacks that hit weak spots do +10% elemental damage.
LevelDetails.2: Attacks that hit weak spots do +12.5% elemental damage.
LevelDetails.3: Attacks that hit weak spots do +15% elemental damage.

Name: Embolden
Description: When targeted by a monster, that monster becomes more likely to become enraged but your own defense is increased.

LevelDetails.1: While active, defense +10, slightly prolongs dodging invincibility and slightly lowers impact when guarding.
LevelDetails.2: While active, defense +20, prolongs invincibility when dodging and lowers impact when guarding.
LevelDetails.3: While active, defense +40, greatly prolongs dodging invincibility and greatly lowers impact when guarding.

Name: Evade Extender
Description: Increases evade distance.

Name: Evade Window
Description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Name: Fire Attack
Description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Name: Fire Resistance
Description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Name: Flinch Free
Description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

LevelDetails.2: Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Name: Focus
Description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

LevelDetails.1: 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times.
LevelDetails.2: 10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times.
LevelDetails.3: 20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

Name: Foray
Description: Increases attack power and affinity when attacking a large monster affected by poison, paralysis, or an elemental blight.

LevelDetails.2: While active, increases attack power +10 and affinity +10%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, increases attack power +15 and affinity +20%.

Name: Fortify
Description: Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can be activated twice.)

LevelDetails.1: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

Name: Free Meal
Description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

Name: Frenzied Bloodlust
Description: Temporarily gain an additional Wirebug when overcoming the Frenzy. The effect duration decreases drastically when your weapon is sheathed.

Name: Frostcraft
Description: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. The effect decreases with each melee hit or shot/arrow fired.

LevelDetails.3: Extends the Frost Gauge even further.

Name: Furious
Description: Using the Red Scroll builds your fury while fighting monsters. Swapping to the Blue Scroll when your fury is full gives you infinite stamina temporarily.

LevelDetails.1: Using Red Scroll: Defense +10, all Res +5 Swap to Blue Scroll: Temporary infinite stamina
LevelDetails.2: Using Red Scroll: Defense +20, all Res +10 Swap to Blue Scroll: Infinite stamina extended
LevelDetails.3: Using Red Scroll: Defense +30, all Res +20 Swap to Blue Scroll: Infinite stamina extended

Name: Geologist
Description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

LevelDetails.1: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
LevelDetails.2: Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points.
LevelDetails.3: Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops.

Name: Good Luck
Description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Name: Grinder (S)
Description: When recovering sharpness, grants a boost to sharpness properties based on the number of levels recovered.

LevelDetails.1: Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 3 levels.
LevelDetails.2: Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels.
LevelDetails.3: Effect activates for 90 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels.

Name: Guard
Description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

LevelDetails.1: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
LevelDetails.2: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
LevelDetails.3: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
LevelDetails.4: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.5: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.9: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.10: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.11: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LevelDetails.12: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Name: Guard Up
Description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Name: Guts
Description: Prevents fainting one time only when damage taken exceeds a certain amount of your remaining health.

LevelDetails.1: Activate effect when vitality is 80 or higher.
LevelDetails.2: Activate effect when vitality is 72 or higher.
LevelDetails.3: Activate effect when vitality is 64 or higher.

Name: Handicraft
Description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Name: Heaven-Sent
Description: Activates when not taking damage for a while during combat with a large monster. The effect is lost when you are knocked back or stray too far away from the monster.

LevelDetails.1: Decreases damage once and reduces stamina consumption while active. Performing a Switch Skill Swap will recover sharpness and reload ammo.
LevelDetails.3: Also nullifies stamina and sharp- ness consumption. Performing a Switch Skill Swap removes or reduces status ailments.

Name: Hellfire Cloak
Description: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks after fulfilling certain conditions.

LevelDetails.3: Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged.
LevelDetails.4: Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.

Name: Heroics
Description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

LevelDetails.1: While active, increases defense by 50 points.
LevelDetails.5: While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

Name: Horn Maestro
Description: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.

Name: Hunger Resistance
Description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

LevelDetails.1: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
LevelDetails.2: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
LevelDetails.3: Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

Name: Ice Attack
Description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Name: Ice Resistance
Description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Name: Intrepid Heart
Description: After filling the gauge by continuously landing attacks, negates damage reactions and reduces damage taken from a single attack that would knock you back.

LevelDetails.2: When activated, damage received is further reduced and will detonate an explosion.

Name: Item Prolonger
Description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

Name: Jump Master
Description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

Name: Kushala Blessing
Description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora.

LevelDetails.3: Also allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

Name: Latent Power
Description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

LevelDetails.1: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.2: While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LevelDetails.4: While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LevelDetails.5: While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Name: Leap of Faith
Description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

Name: Load Shells
Description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

LevelDetails.1: Increases ammo and coating reloading speed.
LevelDetails.2: Gunlance loading capacity +1 Increases charge blade phials

Name: Mail of Hellfire
Description: Decreases defense but increases attack. Exact changes to stats depends on Switch Skill Swap Scroll that is being used.

LevelDetails.1: Using Red Scroll: Defense down, attack up Using Blue Scroll: Resistance down, element up
LevelDetails.2: Further decreases defense and resistance, while further increasing attack and element.
LevelDetails.3: Greatly decreases defense and resistance, while greatly increasing attack and element.

Name: Marathon Runner
Description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

Name: Master Mounter
Description: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.

LevelDetails.1: Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.

Name: Master's Touch
Description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

LevelDetails.1: Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
LevelDetails.2: Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
LevelDetails.3: Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

Name: Maximum Might
Description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

Name: Mind's Eye
Description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

LevelDetails.1: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+10% damage to hard targets when activated).
LevelDetails.2: 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+15% damage to hard targets when activated).
LevelDetails.3: 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+30% damage to hard targets when activated).

Name: Muck Resistance
Description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.

Name: Mushroomancer
Description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

LevelDetails.1: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
LevelDetails.2: Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
LevelDetails.3: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

Name: Normal/Rapid Up
Description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

LevelDetails.1: Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
LevelDetails.2: Increases the power of Normal Ammo and  Rapid-type arrows.
LevelDetails.3: Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and  Rapid-type arrows.

Name: Offensive Guard
Description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

Name: Paralysis Attack
Description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

Name: Paralysis Resistance
Description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

Name: Partbreaker
Description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of monsters.

Name: Peak Performance
Description: Increases attack when your health is full.

Name: Pierce Up
Description: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

LevelDetails.1: Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
LevelDetails.2: Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
LevelDetails.3: Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

Name: Poison Attack
Description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

Name: Poison Resistance
Description: Reduces damage while poisoned.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
LevelDetails.2: Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

Name: Powder Mantle
Description: Continuously attacking a large monster will cause powder to form around you. The color and effects of the powder will change over time.

LevelDetails.1: Get sent flying when wreathed in red powder and you'll receive explosive damage. Attack when in blue for an explosive finish.

Name: Power Prolonger
Description: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.

LevelDetails.1: Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
LevelDetails.2: Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
LevelDetails.3: Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

Name: Protective Polish
Description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Name: Punishing Draw
Description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

LevelDetails.1: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +3.
LevelDetails.2: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +5.
LevelDetails.3: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +7.

Name: Quick Breath
Description: You can remove some statuses or slow their effects by performing a Switch Skill Swap. Health recovers when a status is removed.

Name: Quick Sheathe
Description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

Name: Rapid Fire Up
Description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

Name: Rapid Morph
Description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

Name: Razor Sharp
Description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

Name: Recoil Down
Description: Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.

Name: Recovery Speed
Description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

LevelDetails.1: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
LevelDetails.2: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
LevelDetails.3: Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Name: Recovery Up
Description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

Name: Redirection
Description: Perform a perfectly-timed Switch Skill Swap just as a monster attacks to reduce the damage and negate damage reactions.

LevelDetails.2: Nullifies incoming damage, and automatically performs a Swap Evade backwards which recovers Wirebug Gauge.

Name: Reload Speed
Description: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.

LevelDetails.2: Bowgun speed +2. Loads bow coating automatically.

Name: Resentment
Description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

Name: Resuscitate
Description: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.

Name: Shock Absorber
Description: Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you. (Does not apply during certain status ailments.)

Name: Sleep Attack
Description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

Name: Sleep Resistance
Description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

Name: Slugger
Description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description: Increases damage to large monsters when attacks hit them from behind.

LevelDetails.1: While active, increases attack power by 5%.
LevelDetails.2: While active, increases attack power by 10%.
LevelDetails.3: While active, increases attack power by 20%.

Name: Spare Shot
Description: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

Name: Special Ammo Boost
Description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

LevelDetails.1: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
LevelDetails.2: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

Name: Speed Eating
Description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

Name: Speed Sharpening
Description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

LevelDetails.1: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
LevelDetails.2: Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
LevelDetails.3: Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

Name: Spiribird's Call
Description: Receive the effects of a random Spiribird at fixed intervals. (Certain quests only)

Name: Spread Up
Description: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread- type arrows

LevelDetails.1: Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
LevelDetails.2: Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
LevelDetails.3: Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

Name: Stamina Surge
Description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

Name: Stamina Thief
Description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

Name: Status Trigger
Description: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks to trigger abnormal status buildup on hit.

LevelDetails.1: While active, effect duration is 5 seconds.
LevelDetails.2: While active, effect duration is 8 seconds.
LevelDetails.3: While active, effect duration is 12 seconds

Name: Steadiness
Description: Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots.

LevelDetails.9: Reduces deviation by 2 and slightly extends range.

Name: Stormsoul
Description: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements.

LevelDetails.4: Also increases level of other skills by +1.
LevelDetails.5: Also increases level of other skills by +1 (stacks with previous bonus).

Name: Strife
Description: Increases elemental attack and affinity in proportion to the length of your red health gauge.

LevelDetails.1: Increases attack power in accordance to gauge length.
LevelDetails.2: Further increases attack power in accordance to gauge length.
LevelDetails.3: Further increases attack power in accordance with gauge length. Max out attack for an infinite stamina effect.

Name: Stun Resistance
Description: Reduces stun duration.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

Name: Teostra Blessing
Description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Teostra.

Name: Thunder Alignment
Description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Thunder Serpent Narwa.

Name: Thunder Attack
Description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Name: Thunder Resistance
Description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Name: Tremor Resistance
Description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

LevelDetails.2: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
LevelDetails.3: Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

Name: Tune-Up
Description: Increases the stats of custom mods attached to bowguns.

LevelDetails.1: Increases stats of Silencer and Shield. If neither are equipped, Reload Speed +1.
LevelDetails.2: Also increases stats of Long Barrel and Power Barrel. If neither are equipped, Reload Speed +1 and Steadiness +1.

Name: Wall Runner
Description: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.

LevelDetails.1: Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running.
LevelDetails.2: Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running.
LevelDetails.3: Also temporarily increases attack power by wall running.

Name: Wall Runner (Boost)
Description: Wirebug Gauge recovers faster while wall running.

Name: Water Attack
Description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Name: Water Resistance
Description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Name: Weakness Exploit
Description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

LevelDetails.1: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
LevelDetails.2: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
LevelDetails.3: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

Name: Wide-Range
Description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

LevelDetails.1: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
LevelDetails.2: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
LevelDetails.3: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
LevelDetails.4: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
LevelDetails.5: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

Name: Wind Alignment
Description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Wind Serpent Ibushi.

Name: Wind Mantle
Description: Using Silkbind attacks boosts Wirebug Gauge recovery. Landing continuous attacks increases the effect. Wears off when you sheathe your weapon.

Name: Windproof
Description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

LevelDetails.2: Negates minor and major wind pressure.
LevelDetails.3: Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

Name: Wirebug Whisperer
Description: Improves your handling of Wirebugs.

LevelDetails.1: Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%.
LevelDetails.3: Also increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.
